channel.title: Pandemic Learnings on sahilister's Reimagined Doodle

item.title: Learnings and Findings During the Pandemic
item.description: The COVID-19 pandemic has been hard for everyone. Folks suffered, folks died. Things changed drastically, and we were left locked in our homes. This did leave a lot of time to somewhat explore too and eventually it did help me learn about quite a few things which I now love and use almost daily. You can see my present setup blog here. Here’s a long list of things within my self defined categories:
